about_the_game:
Live streaming game "Force of Numbers"

Live stream "Force of Numbers" and play with your viewers!
Note:This game is a viewer-participation game for video streamers.

    [1]What kind of game is it?
This game is a typical adventure RPG game where you choose your choices... but it is the viewers watching the stream who basically choose the choices.

Which path to take, whether to fight the enemy, and even whether to continue when defeated... the streamer, the player, cannot choose.

    [2]So what does the streamer, the player, do?
Of course, streamers don't just stare at the screen all the time.
There are gimmicks that allow you to break through labyrinths based on information from viewers, test your luck, and sometimes work together with the viewers to overcome difficult challenges.

You can induce the choices, or leave it up to the viewers... Enjoy streaming your games the way you like.

    [3]How do viewers participate in the game?
Viewers need the VoteClient app (iOS/Android App, free of charge) to participate.
Viewers can join the game by downloading the app to thier smartphone/tablet and entering the room created by the streamer.
The more people who participate, the more advantageous you will be in the game. Also, As the number of participants increases, choices may change....

What kind of miracles will happen during your live stream?
